gfx_panel
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  gfx_panel.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
OvalShape, RectangleShape
public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

Parent of all Shapes. Rectangles,Ovals and others inherite from this class. a Shape can be drawn on GfxPanel.

Author:
Creative

setX

public void setX(int x)
Move this shape to certain X position, move the attachees also.

Parameters:

moveX

public void moveX(int delta_x)
Moves this shape by a value delta_x. if delta_x is positive, shape moves right, else , to the left.

Parameters:
delta_x - distance to move the shape along the x-axis

moveY

public void moveY(int delta_y)
Moves this shape by a value delta_y. if delta_y is positive, shape moves down, else , up.

Parameters:
delta_y - distance to move the shape along the y-axis
